// frontend/src/components/MediaList.js
import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./index.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MediaList=()=>{const navigation=useNavigate();const[mediaList,setMediaList]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchMedia=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/media');setMediaList(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching media list:',error);}};fetchMedia();},[]);const getDetails=id=>{navigation("/media/".concat(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"heading",style:{color:'white',fontSize:35,fontWeight:'bold'},children:"Media list"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigation('/upload'),style:{backgroundColor:'green',color:'white',alignItems:'center',textAlign:'center',justifyContent:"center",alignSelf:'flex-end',borderWidth:0,fontSize:12,fontWeight:600,cursor:'pointer',marginTop:0,padding:10,borderRadius:10,width:"10%",marginBottom:5},children:" Upload Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"innercontainer2",children:mediaList.length!==0?mediaList.map(media=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>getDetails(media.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:media.thumbnailUrl,alt:media.title,height:"130"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{color:'white',fontSize:25,fontWeight:'bold'},children:media.title})]})},media.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container3",style:{backgroundColor:'lightgrey',alignSelf:'center',width:'100%'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{color:"red",children:"Upload Data "})})})]});};export default MediaList;
